data.message: Stupid people. Stop arguing over this. If you support it, support it. If you don't, then don't. There's no reason to go around stepping on people's feet over who they are. You are who you are. I'm lesbian. And I dream of marrying my wonderful girlfriend one day. And having children with her. And I think the both of us will be great parents. And I can give my child every bit of the love a straight parent can. Facebook, thank you. At least not everyone is homophobic.

replies.message: Just because someone does not support gay marriage does not necessarily mean they are homophobic
I am homophobic. if I knew you, I would prob. be friends. BUT, it does not mean I support your choice. I am friends with a number of lesbians.
